title: Collaborative Learning-Based Mathematics Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental secondary mathematics concepts (functions, equations, statistics)
context.additional_context: Utilization of smartphone-based real-time collaboration tools (Google Docs, Jamboard).

learning_goals: Learners solve over 80% of real-world math problems through collaborative group activities (3-person teams).
Learners provide at least two constructive evaluations of peers' problem-solving processes using peer feedback criteria.
Learners can explain three communication strategies for resolving conflicts during collaborative learning.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
